Base.name: Pirate Ship
Base.description1: a water vessel run by a crew consisting of pirates
Base.description2: there are various roles on the ship sich as the captain, lookouts, mats, and swabbies
Base.description3: the area of the ship that should be avoided most is the plank

Base.name: Public Washroom
Base.description1: a washroom that is accessed by the general public, or specifically in some places, by customers
Base.description2: public washrooms often have more than one stall
Base.description3: people do their... business there, as well as wash their hands, refresh their appearance and take care of their children's needs

Base.name: Babysitting
Base.description1: a job which involves the care and supervision of a child
Base.description2: the tasks of a baby sitter can include meal preparation, feeding, teaching, driving, and supervision
Base.description3: there are no 'barriers to entry' to qualify for the job of babysitter
